import React from 'react' import './Testimonials.css' import {testimonialsData} from '../../data/testimonialsData' import { useState } from 'react' const Testimonials = () => { const [selected, setSelected] = useState(0); const tLength = testimonialsData.length; return (
Testimonials What they say about us {testimonialsData[selected].review} {testimonialsData[selected].name} - {testimonialsData[selected].status}
) } export default Testimonials
